ActiveMagneticBearing¶

class +AMrotorSIM.@ActiveMagneticBearing.ActiveMagneticBearing(cnfg)¶

Bases: handle

activeMagneticBearing Class for AMB Creates other objects of the type SimpleBearing and pidController

cnfg = None¶

Bearing-object that gets created by this object (AMB)

simpleBearing = None¶

pidController-objects that get created by AMB-object

pidController = None¶

N/m, stiffness because of the magnetic field, typically negative value

targetDisplacementX = None¶

A/m

A/(m*s)

As/m

+AMrotorSIM.@ActiveMagneticBearing.assemble(AMB, r)¶

Creates SimpleBearing and pidController-objects for activeMagneticBearing and adds it to the rotorsystem

  • r (object) – object of type Rotorsystem
